```{r}
library("lpSolveAPI")
library("magrittr")
```
```{r}
create.base.lp <- function() {
  make.lp(0, 2) %T>%
  lp.control(sense = "max") %T>%
  set.objfn(c(8, 5)) %T>%
  add.constraint(c(1, 1), "<=", 6) %T>%
  add.constraint(c(9, 5), "<=", 45)
}
```

```{r}
sp1 <- create.base.lp()
solve(sp1)
get.objective(sp1)
get.variables(sp1)
```

```{r}
sp2 <- create.base.lp()
add.constraint(sp2, c(1,0), ">=", 4)
solve(sp2)
get.objective(sp2)
get.variables(sp2)
```

```{r}
sp3 <- create.base.lp()
add.constraint(sp3, c(1,0), ">=", 4)
add.constraint(sp3, c(0,1), ">=",2)
solve(sp3)
get.objective(sp3)
get.variables(sp3)
```

```{r}
sp4 <- create.base.lp()
add.constraint(sp4, c(1,0), ">=", 4)
add.constraint(sp4,c(0,1),"<=",1)
solve(sp4)
get.objective(sp4)
get.variables(sp4)
```

```{r}
sp5 <- create.base.lp()
add.constraint(sp5,c(1,0),">=",5)
add.constraint(sp5,c(0,1),"<=",1)
solve(sp5)
get.objective(sp5)
get.variables(sp5)
```

```{r}
sp6 <- create.base.lp()
add.constraint(sp6,c(1,0),"=",4)
add.constraint(sp6,c(0,1),"<=",1)
```
